name: EBSA HAIR CUSTOM WIGS
description:
ALTHOUGH IT MAY SAY ***SHIPS EVERYWHERE*** WE ONLY SHIP TO AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND

A custom wig is similar to a lace front but instead of the whole hair being on a lace cap. With a custom wig you have your lace closure and the 3 or more bundles sewed on a wig cap, and its made to meet your specifications. This style is the latest and the most cheapest alternative to a lace front. Our custom wigs can last up to 1-2 years with regular maintenance and patching up on the wig. Our custom wigs are also versatile ( you can tie it up). 

HOW CAN I ORDER THIS?
ITS EASY ALL YOU HAVE TO DO IS SELECT THE PRICE ADD T CART AND PURCHASE ONE OF OUR **3 BUNDLES + 1 CLOSURE DEAL** AND ADD TO CART! if you want custom coloring please copy this link and past it on your url and select the color you want. 
 --> http://ebsahair.bigcartel.com/product/hair-coloring <-- 

GET $5.OO OFF OUR CUSTOM WIGS IF YOU PURCHASE  ANY 3 BUNDLES AND CLOSURE DEALS ON EURASIAN. 

ONCE PAYMENT IS MADE WE WILL SEND YOU A WORD DOCUMENT AND YOU ARE REQUIRED TO FILL IN THE SPECIFIC MEASUREMENT OF YOU HEAD AND ANY OTHER INQUIRIES YOU HAVE. ** this is to make sure your wig fits perfectly**

HOW LONG WILL IT TAKE FOR MY WIG TO DONE? 
All wigs are made of Friday, Saturday & Sunday. ***IF HAIR IS PURCHASED ON SUNDAY, YOU UNIT WILL BE MADE ON FRIDAY. (depending on the amount of orders we have). **

HOW DO I MAINTAIN MY WIG?
Our wigs come with combs to hold the hair place/ elastic band (for secure fitting). To maintain it the best thing is to take it off whilst sleeping.  When combing hair DO NOT comb the wefts.    

WHAT TO EXPECT WITH YOU WIG?
 - Closure knots bleached 
 - Hair washed and deep conditioned ( ready to install)
 - The best quality 100% virgin hair. 
 - Long lasting wig

ALTHOUGH IT MAY SAY ***SHIPS EVERYWHERE*** WE ONLY SHIP TO AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND

options.name: CUSTOM WIG EURASIAN (ALL HAIR TYPE) 3 BUNDLES   CLOSURE

name: HAIR COLORING
description:
we can dye your hair bundles just for $10.00 on each bundle and $5.00 on each closure, hair will be conditioned after dying process so you can install your bundles once  you receive them

We you can chose colors from the color chart our our two most popular celebrity hair color. 

Ciara Platinum blonde : the color speaks for it self but we will leave the roots black just like she did 


Beyonce inspired Honey Blonde Bombshell: 
The hair is honey blonde with  light and dark strands or honey blonde. (we love this hair color suits most skin types)   

IF THERE ARE ANY OTHER STYLES/ COLORS YOU WANT BUT WE DO NOT OFFER FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US WITH A SAMPLE (PICTURE PREFERABLY ) OF THE HAIR COLOR/ STYLE.

name: CUSTOM OMBRE
description:
Introducing Ombre!
 
This is a French-termed hair trend that features darker, more natural hues at the roots with gradually-dyed lightening at the ends. 
Itâ€™s a big hair trend and man celebrities have this Chanel Iman, Jennifer Hudson, Naomi Campbell, Raven-Symone . Finally, we are able to Ombre your bundles and also treat the hair after so once its mailed to you just sew/ glue in your hair no washing needed. Get the celebrity look you desire at a low price!! 

We do Ombre in 3 different shades 

Platinum Blonde ( fist picture)
Honey blonde (second picture)
Light red ***not vibrant red**(last picture) 

**PLEASE NOTE: THIS DOES NOT INCLUDE THE *BUNDLES* HAIR BUNDLES ARE SOLD SEPARATELY IN ORDER TO GET OMBRE YOU MUST PURCHASE HAIR BUNDLES. **

name: 100% Virgin Peruvian Straight Hair 3pc or 4pcs Lot
description:
Peruvian Hair is a multi-purpose hair! It's extremely soft and ultimately feather light. You can have up to five bundles of a Peruvian hair installed and still maintain a feathery light, natural style. This hair is coarser in texture than Indian or Brazilian hair and its luster is low to medium. It blends very well with African-American relaxed hair textures and medium Caucasian hair textures. This hair is Luxurious and another one of our favorites.

Hair Care

Before sleeping or any daily activity that makes the hair wet brush thoroughly between each row before putting your hair in two big braids.

Wash the hair twice a week or more.

For long, and curly hair use a combination of 2/3 shampoo with 1/3 moisturizing conditioner, rinse and reapply conditioner. Leave the conditioner in while combing out hair with a wide tooth comb or vent brush starting at the bottom and working up each section. Rinse and style as usual

name: 100% Virgin  Peruvian Body Wave 3pc or 4pcs Lot
description:
Peruvian Hair is a multi-purpose hair! It's extremely soft and ultimately feather light. You can have up to five bundles of a Peruvian hair installed and still maintain a feathery light, natural  style. This hair is coarser in texture than Indian or Brazilian hair and its luster is low to medium. It blends very well with African-American relaxed hair textures and medium Caucasian hair textures. This hair is Luxurious and another one of our favorites.

Hair Care

Before sleeping or any daily activity that makes the hair wet  brush thoroughly between each row before putting your hair in two big braids. 

Wash the hair  twice a week or more. 

For long, and curly hair use a combination of 2/3 shampoo with 1/3 moisturizing conditioner, rinse and reapply conditioner. Leave the conditioner in while combing out hair with a wide tooth comb or vent brush starting at the bottom and working up each section. Rinse and style as usual.

name: 100% Virgin Brazilian Straight Hair Closure + 3 Bundles
description:
ALTHOUGH IT MAY SAY ***SHIPS EVERYWHERE*** WE ONLY SHIP TO AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND

Brazilian Hair is the Must Have hair in the market right now!!!! because of its softness, durability and density the hair is able to be used diversely. This texture is easiest to blend with most ethnicity from some Caucasian textures to African American. Brazilian hair is extremely soft, because of its density, you may not want to use as much as you would normally use with other textures. Less is more with Brazilian hair because of its natural density. The hair is less likely to frizz like other hair types for example Indian Hair. This hair is amazing!

This hair is reported to have extremely minimal shedding.

OUR BUNDLES WEIGH 100g

ALTHOUGH IT MAY SAY ***SHIPS EVERYWHERE*** WE ONLY SHIP TO AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND

name: 100% Virgin Eurasian Straight Hair Closure + 3 Bundles
description:
ALTHOUGH IT MAY SAY ***SHIPS EVERYWHERE*** WE ONLY SHIP TO AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND

Eurasian hair one of the most richest glamorous hair types, collected from donors in several regions of Eurasia (women from Asian and European backgrounds). The density and fullness of Eurasian hair is very similar to Brazilian hair, but the texture is more defined and unique. Eurasian hair is very soft, smooth, and silky in texture. This hair type is absolutely gorgeous, its new on the market with very few limited suppliers selling the hair is a guaranteed showstopper! it holds pattern after being straightened and curled very well.

Texture can match with some Caucasian, Hispanic, and relaxed African American hair

If its your first time buying a weave or looking for more fuller and healthy hair EBSA HAIR recommends this for you!

***BUNDLES WEIGH 100g*** 
ALTHOUGH IT MAY SAY ***SHIPS EVERYWHERE*** WE ONLY SHIP TO AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND

name: 100% Virgin Cambodian Body Wave
description:
ALTHOUGH IT MAY SAY ***SHIPS EVERYWHERE*** WE ONLY SHIP TO AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND 

Cambodian hair is light, silky and is lustrous in texture. The light texture of the Cambodian human hair makes it effortless to wear and maintain, texture can match with some Caucasian, Hispanic, and relaxed African American hair. if hair is treated with proper care, Cambodian human hair will not mat or tangle and maintain its silky, luscious state.


how to care for it?
Hydration both before and after installation is the most important step to maintaining the exquisite texture and appearance of your hair. 

OUR BUNDLES WEIGH 100g
